transcript.text: [Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is David 1837 a.n today's
date is April 9th 2019 and the title of
the episode is central bank's panic
independence question Congress lost
control of the Fed now we know that
Robert Mueller has been investigating
Donald Trump for over two years now and
has concluded that there is no case to
answer on his colluding with Russia
during his election campaign given that
news you would expect markets to have
soared instead they've reacted by
tanking and there's nothing the markets
hate more than political uncertainty now
is not a good time to be fully committed
to stocks gold has rallied along with
silver this year and it might be time to
think about putting some of your money
into precious metals if you call noble
gold you can speak to one of their
advisers about the pros and cons of
buying precious metals so click the link
below to get your free gold IRA guide or
just call eight seven seven six four six
five three four seven and make sure to
mention x20 to report to get the free
gold investment guide let's get into the
economic collapse financial news now we
know that Trump the Patriots they're
going to be shaping the narrative
they're gonna be going after the central
bank system and the central bank right
now they're in a bit of a panic because
we are seeing more and more articles of
talking about independence how you need
to leave the central bank alone you
shouldn't be touching the central bank
and then also we're starting to hear
that Congress might have lost control of
the central bank where the Fed right now
is not following their mandate and
Congress is not holding the central bank
to their mandate and we'll be talking
about that in just a minute but let's
head out to the UK because it seems like
everything that we've been talking about
how the EU how Teresa May how the
certain government officials how they
want to postpone the inevitable the UK
breaking away from the EU the people
voted they had a referendum and the
government the EU they're not following
what the people want and all of a sudden
and this is really not a surprise to all
of us Prime Minister Theresa May
is considering amending her withdrawal
agreement to include a commons vote on
authorizing a second confirmation
another referendum I mean this is just
unbelievable and we talked about this
they're gonna do everything they
possibly can to stop as they do not want
this to happen and I think it's time for
the people to speak out loudly and to
say enough is enough we need to break
away hopefully that happens there are
people that are out there saying yeah
enough is enough and we can see that
those in government those in the Central
Bank those that are in league with the
central bank they don't want this to
happen they're trying to stop it any way
they possibly can because you have to
remember their biggest fear is to have a
country leave and the country to prosper
so if the UK separates itself from the
EU and they prosper how do you think
other countries are going to look at the
EU well the EU countries are doing
poorly the UK left and they're doing
really really well maybe we should leave
and you have to remember what's going on
around the world people are now
questioning the central bank people are
saying wait a minute
the global system the central bank
system might not be what we need because
it is not helping us we spent many many
years and all we've seen is austerity
we've seen debt and we haven't seen
anything improve yes the elite they've
gotten richer but everyone else they're
struggling and Trump here in the United
States he's trying to put the United
States on an even playing field because
he knows we're gonna be moving away from
the Federal Reserve debt note which is
the reserve currency of the world and
what he needs to do is he needs to set
up fair and balanced trade systems this
is why he's making bad bilateral trade
deals all across the globe and he's
going to continue to do this and he's
going to use tariffs
to leverage this and no tariffs are not
going to bring down the global economy
I'm sorry the global economy was doomed
from the beginning once the central bank
took over because the weight of debt on
the entire system it cannot be sustained
and their system was declining way
before Trump they just thought they were
going to have an event to cover it all
up now they're exposed they don't know
what to do so what is Trump doing Trump
said on Tuesday that the European Union
has taken advantage of US trade and it
will soon stop he tweeted out the
following the World Trade Organization
finds that the European Union subsidies
to Airbus has adversely impacted the
United States which will now put tariffs
on 11 billion of EU products the EU has
taken advantage of the u.s. on trade for
many years it will soon stop so what's
happening here Trump just like with
China he is stopping what the central
bankers were setting up over these past
many many years remember their plan was
to have a globalist system their plan
was to have a one-world currency now
Trump is chopping all that up and he's
creating bilateral trade agreements
using tariffs to leverage these trade
deals because you know the central
bankers they're just not going to give
in if you say hey the trade deal it's
not good for the people here we need to
negotiate they're gonna say too bad this
is what we have so Trump needs to use
tariffs to force the globalists to force
the central bank into doing what he
wants and moving us away from this
global system now the IMF is out there
and they slashed their world growth
outlook to the weakest in decades and
they're saying it's because of the
tariffs the thing is is that by the time
this system comes down all these tariffs
they won't be there anymore Trump would
have already negotiated a new deal with
China with the EU if the EU still exists
and there won't be tariffs to blame this
entire implosion of the economic system
the blame will be at the central bank
they already have this planned they know
that they were trying to bring down the
economic system before 2020 when I say
they I am talking about the Patriots
they already knew they were going to try
to raise interest rates look what has
happened since cue made that post no
interest rate hikes in 2019 they're
ending the tightening of their balance
sheet the central bank's balance sheet
now Trump and the Patriots they're very
close to making a deal with China and
now he's pushing the EU to make a better
trade deal with the United States so if
the Patriots knew about the central bank
raising the rates trying to bring down
the economy in 2020 don't you think they
realized that they're gonna try to blame
it on the tariffs of course they do but
they know they need to use the tariffs
for leverage and what's eventually going
to happen is they're going to make these
deals and they're going to get rid of
the tariffs yes as soon as the deal is
made they're not just gonna get rid of
it they want to make sure that these
countries comply once they are complying
the tariffs will then be removed and
what do the central banks do at that
point they're stuck now we know that
Trump and the Patriots there will be
going after the Federal Reserve the
Federal Reserve is completely out of
control they've been out of control for
a very long time and they're acting in
ways and with powers that were never
explicitly granted by Congress now of
course we're not allowed to audit the
Fed to see what else they've been doing
because we know they've been doing quite
a bit and there's a reason why they
don't want us to audit them because we
would find out what they were doing but
Trump already started everything in
motion because he's suggesting that
Herman Cain and Stephen Moore
be put on the Federal Reserve Board and
the bankers the central bankers the
elite they don't want this to happen
cane represents a threat to the Cabal
that has controlled the central bank for
decades media outlets and other allied
constituencies have howled with rage at
the prospect of Trump packing the Fed
while the Fed is meant to be independent
from the executive branch on a
day-to-day basis it is certainly not
independent of Congress or the law yet
the Fed in recent years has shown a
troubling tendency to deviate from its
legal mandate and make up new
authorities to fit the changing economic
situation here's an example this notion
that we should be seeking 2% rate of
inflation well this was in part of their
mandate their mandate was no inflation
so anybody who cares to read the 1978
humphrey-hawkins law will know that the
Fed is directed by Congress to seek full
employment and zero inflation not two
percent not three percent not nine
percent but zero yet going back a decade
or more
the Fed led by Janet Yellen Ben Bernanke
and the rest they have advanced their
policies of actively embracing inflation
and either Bernanke
Yellen or any of these individuals
bothered to consult Congress when they
decided to discard their legal
responsibilities my question is where is
Congress why haven't they done anything
shouldn't they be on top of this well
why would they be there corrupt we
talked about this many times before
those individuals in Congress why would
they want to stop something that makes
them a huge amount of money this is all
free money we can borrow we can put it
into our program siphon it off have it
come back to us why
we want to end this they wouldn't and we
see that there are certain individuals
within Congress
I'm Democrat on the Republican side that
are not going to support Trump in his
push to take over the Federal Reserve to
restructure the Federal Reserve these
individuals they're gonna show
themselves because just like Q has been
telling us in the past they're going to
scream the loudest once he starts making
the move individuals are going to come
out of the woodwork and you're gonna
start to realize whoa they're in line
with the central bank look at the people
that are coming out saying we don't want
more we don't want King this will get
worse as time goes on and we're seeing a
lot more articles about how the Federal
Reserve needs to be independent Neil
Irwin had a New York Times article on
April 6 2019 warning readers of the
potential harm that the Federal Reserve
loses its independence the basis for the
warning is that Trump seems prepared to
nominate Moore and Kane to the Fed to
individuals with no obvious
qualifications for the job other than
their loyalty to Trump so listen to what
they're saying here they're worried
about Trump putting individuals in that
aren't going along with the narrative
they're not part of the system Trump's
not part of the system and the people
that he's bringing in are not part of
the system the people that he's bringing
in want to change the system and this is
what they're afraid of this is why
they're talking about independence that
you can't control the Fed they have to
be completely independent but you can
see that Congress they have completely
lost control of the Federal Reserve they
don't care what the Fed does as long as
they continually make more and more
money and they're not going to do
anything about it think about it go back
where was Congress since 1913 we've only
had a handful of people that actually
came out and said maybe we should audit
the Fed it's been a pretty long time we
had Ron Paul Rand Paul Thomas Massie
maybe a couple of others but where's the
rest of Congress they're supposed to be
controlling the Fed overseeing the Fed
and making sure they follow their
mandate full employment zero inflation
is the dollar supposed to lose value
because that's what zero inflation means
it means the value of the dollar stays
the same have they done this no it has
lost value over time and this is why it
takes more and more dollars to pay for
the same exact products so where are the
lawmakers where are they they're nowhere
to be found
and it's also worth noting that the Fed
has been very close to the financial
sector the 12 regional bank presidents
who sit on the Open Market Committee
that sets monetary policy are largely
appointed by the banks in their regions
the feds policy has led unemployment to
be higher than necessary over much of
the last four decades this has prevented
millions of workers from having jobs and
lowered wages for tens of millions or
more in so far as the feds independence
has meant close ties to the financial
industry it has not been good news for
most people in this country Trump right
now and the Patriots they are making the
move putting all the players in place to
control the Fed they will no longer be
independent the people will control the
Fed structure change is coming
and yes they need to worry because once
the crisis hits and Trump the Patriots
they're going to use the crisis they
know that this economy can't last
forever they know they're going to use
this to move everyone into saying we
need to take a look at the Federal
Reserve think about what Trump has been
doing every time something happens he
blames it on the Fed stock market came
down while the Fed just raised the rates
well if the Fed didn't raise the rates
the economy would be a lot better maybe
the Fed should lower the rates he even
